src:
Presiden FIFA Langsung Telepon Ketua Baru PSSI, Ucapkan Selamat
02 Nov 2019, 16:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan, yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule, telah resmi terpilih sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023. Dia pun langsung mendapat restu FIFA.
Dalam Kongres PSSI di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019), Iwan Bule mendapatkan 82 suara dari 86 voters. Dia mengalahkan dua pesaingnya yang bertahan, Rahim Soekasah dan Arif Wicaksono.
Terpilihnya Iwan Bule langsung disapa hangat oleh Presiden FIFA, Gianni Infantino. Dia menaruh harapan besar sepak bola Indonesia akan bangkit dengan terpilihnya Iwan Bule sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023.
Hal tersebut disampaikan oleh Infantino dalam sambungan telepon dengan Sekjen PSSI, Ratu Tisha Destria seusai KLB PSSI yang diagendakan pemilihan Ketua Umum PSSI periode 2019-2023.
"Saya mengucapkan selamat dan saya menaruh harapan besar di bawah kepemimpinan anda, sepak bola Indonesia akan bangkit," ujar Infantino dalam sambungan telepon yang turut diperdengarkan kepada Iwan Bule.
text:
FIFA President Directly Call PSSI's New Chairperson, Congratulate
02 Nov 2019, 16:01 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mochamad Iriawan, who is familiarly called Iwan Bule, has been officially elected as Chairman of the PSSI 2019-2023 period. He immediately got FIFA's blessing.
In the PSSI Congress at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019), Iwan Bule received 82 votes from 86 voters. He defeated two of his remaining rivals, Rahim Soekasah and Arif Wicaksono.
The election of Iwan Bule was immediately greeted warmly by FIFA President, Gianni Infantino. He hopes that Indonesian football will rise with the election of Iwan Bule as General Chair of PSSI 2019-2023.
This was conveyed by Infantino in a telephone connection with the Secretary General of PSSI, Ratu Tisha Destria after the PSSI KLB was scheduled for the election of the Chairperson of PSSI 2019-2023.
"I congratulate you and I have great hopes that under your leadership, Indonesian football will rise," Infantino said on the telephone line which was also played to Iwan Bule.
